org.jgentleframework.configure
Class ConfigurationProxy

java.lang.Object
  org.jgentleframework.configure.ConfigurationProxy
All Implemented Interfaces:
net.sf.cglib.proxy.Callback, net.sf.cglib.proxy.MethodInterceptor
public class ConfigurationProxy
extends java.lang.Object
implements net.sf.cglib.proxy.MethodInterceptor

This proxy class is responsible for configurable object instantiation containing all information of configured data.

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com
